alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:37AM CDT until June 16 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RAPIDES AND AVOYELLES PARISHES... At 337 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jena to near Alexandria International Airport, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Marksville, Simmesport, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Effie, Ball, Cottonport, Mansura, Hessmer, Plaucheville, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, Kingsville, Poland, Kolin and Ruby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
